certificates.name: Get Started with API Gateway Skill Badge
certificates.description: Complete the introductory Use Functions, Formulas, and Charts in Google Sheets skill badge to demonstrate skills in the following: using API Gateway to deploy, secure, and manage APIs with a fully managed gateway.

certificates.name: Get Started with Cloud Storage Skill Badge
certificates.description: Complete the Get Started with Cloud Storage skill badge to demonstrate skills in the following: how to create a Cloud Storage bucket, how to use the Cloud Storage command line, and how to use Bucket Lock to protect objects in a bucket.

certificates.name: The Basics of Google Cloud Compute Skill Badge
certificates.description: Complete the The Basics of Google Cloud Compute skill badge to demonstrate skills in the following: how to work with virtual machines (VMs), persistent disks, and web servers using Compute Engine.

certificates.name: Get Started with Dataplex Skill Badge
certificates.description: Complete the Get Started with Dataplex skill badge to demonstrate skills in the following: use Dataplex to start creating a data mesh on Google Cloud.
